summary: Hi! So I was wondering would the missus ever bring Oliver to one of Harry’s shows as well as the baby?
question: Hi! So I was wondering would the missus ever bring Oliver to one of Harry’s shows as well as the baby?
answer:
Hi lovey!! Oh yes she’d absolutely bring the kids to one of the shows! Probably one she knew Anne or some of Harry’s friends would be at so they could get some time in with them as well!

Oliver would have a hand on his mom at all times because “germs everywhere” and he’d want headphones because the screams would just be a little much for him. While the baby would just stay securely strapped to her chest with ear protection on and a giggly little grin on her face because let’s face it she’s a daddy’s girl. 💖

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: CEO Harry having a breakdown in a middle of a meeting once it finally hits him that his  missus is gone / ended the...
question: CEO Harry having a breakdown in a middle of a meeting once it finally hits him that his  missus is gone / ended the relationship.
answer:
ceo!harry can for sure handle the leaving and rejections in his own company, trust him, but god does he feel powerless when it’s about him being left by his missus.

it hasn’t really dawned on him completely, just being reminded that you’re not there anymore when his finger hovers over your contact, when he looks at the passenger seat to rest his hand on and when he turns his figure on the bed.

god, it’s like him mending himself to the ghost of you and he doesn’t want to believe that you’ve left him, even without an explanation and a goodbye yet he knows why and he knows he deserves it but it still hasn’t dawned on him.

he’s on one of his meetings, his mind not on it at all and he’s oblivious to the concerned eyes on him while sarah just rushes in and excused his boss for what she deems is something more important than this.

his assistant understands his pain and she leads him to his office, harry just softly crying because he knows he isn’t getting in terms with it any time soon.

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: Dear Hannah, I saw that you wrote something about the reader being afraid of airplanes/flying and I was wondering, if you are up...
question: Dear Hannah, I saw that you wrote something about the reader being afraid of airplanes/flying and I was wondering, if you are up for it of course, you could write something about the reader being afraid of the sea? I’m really afraid of the sea just because you can’t see what is going on under you! If I’m in water the only thing I can think about is sharks eating me alive! Proud of you and your amazing work! Cheers! x
answer:
“get in the water with me. could carry you if you want.”

harry offers as the both of you overlook the sea at the yacht, nudging your shoulder as he smiles and his offer makes you shake your head no eagerly.

“oh god no.”

“why?”

you look back to the blue that’s scaring you as you think about on what could be underneath it, rendering you scared when your assumptions get fueled by the documentaries you watch of what could, what used to, and what will be there.

harry’s watching you have an ongoing debate with yourself, not being able to read your mind when you realize that you can swim but thinking about the endless possibilities makes you just floppy and immediately render you too in your abilities powerless.

“m’scared.”

he understands your fear and he makes a note to calm you about it, holding his hand out as he smiles.

you only look down on it, a bit confused on why he isn’t going with his mostly persistent attitude.

“s’okay. wanna watch a movie with me?”


hi lovie! i have some fear of the sea too and it’s really ironic that i do because of certain circumstances, and idk how to swim! all the love to you! x

blog.name: hazzasbabyhoney
blog.title: Harry Girl ‘10
blog.description:
🐝 Wanna be his Baby Honey 🍯

Ship Larry but everyone’s more than welcome here 🌼

My main is choo-choo-muther-fucker so you don’t all think I’m a rude bitch

body:
What Harry does is exhausting.

Performing in a different state every night is exhausting.

Singing every day is exhausting.

Trying to address every social issue is exhausting.

Sometimes he will be off, tired, less than happy.

Every time he performs puts his entire heart into his concerts - despite what he feels the second he leaves the stage.

All my gratitude goes to him for having the strength to do what he does.

We hope that everything is okay Haz, and if it’s not okay now it will be soon.

All our love x

blog.name: kittemily
blog.title: ¡Oh boy!
blog.description: I'm working towards my goal of being Harry Styles' best friend

body:
Looking for Advice!

Hey guys! I don’t talk that much on here but I’m really hoping I can get some advice from people about my Harry concert on Saturday. I’m going alone and I have a GA ticket. I haven’t been to many concerts (really only been to one direction concerts and I’ve never been in a GA area) so I was hoping people could help me figure out what time to get there in order to get the best spot, what I should bring, what to expect for the day and the concert. I just know there’s A LOT of you who frequently see live music and I’d like your do’s and don’t’s for this Saturday in Chicago.

summary: Imagine when she eventually tells him she’s bisexual and he like stutters and goes a little red because he’s surprised and when...
question: Imagine when she eventually tells him she’s bisexual and he like stutters and goes a little red because he’s surprised and when the shock is over he wants to know everything about the relationship with your previous girlfriend! Love you bubba! X
answer:
love you too!

and harry would be flustered that he didn’t notice that earlier but he still apologizes even if there’s no need for him too, immediately being hugged by you who’s laughing at his embarrassment.

he’d keep you up longer at night than usual asking things about what you were with her, how were things, asking questions here and there and asking why it didn’t work out and harry would be so amazed and you bET that there’s gonna be a song about it
